member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.Name
member.summary: The name of the function parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.SemanticName
member.summary: The HLSL semantic that is associated with this function parameter. This name includes the index, for example, SV_Target[n].

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the variable type for the parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.Class
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the variable class for the parameter as one of scalar, vector, matrix, object, and so on.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.Rows
member.summary: The number of rows for a matrix parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.Columns
member.summary: The number of columns for a matrix parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.InterpolationMode
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the interpolation mode for the parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies semantic flags for the parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.FirstInRegister
member.summary: The first input register for this parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.FirstInComponent
member.summary: The first input register component for this parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.FirstOutRegister
member.summary: The first output register for this parameter.

member.name: D3D12_PARAMETER_DESC.FirstOutComponent
member.summary: The first output register component for this parameter.
